department.dept_long_name: Department of Romance Languages and Literatures

course.title: Graduate Seminar: New Worlds of Early Modern Poetry in Spanish
course.description: Imitation of Latin and Italian models, rediscovery of Spain's medieval traditions and global exploration reshape 16th- and 17th-century lyric and epic, redefining poetic language itself.
course.notes: Conducted in Spanish and English. An advanced reading knowledge of Spanish is essential.
